name: Occupation and sector of employed science, engineering, and health research doctorate recipients living in the United States: 2021
description: Occupation and sector of employed science, engineering, and health research doctorate recipients living in the United States: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_business_or_industry_all_business_or_industry
variableMeasured.description: Business Or Industry All Business Or Industry

variableMeasured.name: field_business_or_industry_self_employed_or_not_incorporated
variableMeasured.description: Business Or Industry Self Employed Or Not Incorporated

notes: Non-S&E occupations includes doctorate holders working in both non-STEM and STEM middle-skill occupations because the Survey of Doctorate Recipients (SDR) does not produce data on STEM middle-skill occupations. Percentages may not sum to 100% because of rounding. Numbers are rounded to the nearest 100; thus, numbers may not sum due to rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients (SDR), Public-Use File, 2021.Science and Engineering Indicators
